entry.title: RT alephv.eth: FYI, hustle culture is out. What's cool is sleep maxing, you gotta be sleeping 18 hours a night doing 2 hours of work then having a nap...
entry.summary: RT alephv.eth FYI, hustle culture is out. What's cool is sleep maxing, you gotta be sleeping 18 hours a night doing 2 hours of work then having a nap. You gotta be unable to get out of bed for more than 3 hours, you gotta be prioritizing laying down over meetings. I do this and it's why I win.
